column5: Does anyone have a report from Ghost River this year? I know that quite a few people fish there but rarely see reports. We leave in 29 days and am more curious about water levels than the fishing. Thanks wmd
I was 50 miles north of there a month ago and the water was 2 feet lower than most years. Still caught fish and had a great time.
We fished GRL the second week of July water is down about 2 to 3 feet.You have to pull yourself through the tunnel at clamshell. Fishing was fair at best.
